name: Pyro Ball
description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature, dealing 2d8 + MOVE fire damage on hit. On hit, the target must make a DEX save, becoming burned on failure.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d8 at level 10, and 4d10 at level 17.
